mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_nutr_eat_blck.select */ SELECT sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,eat_qty_fr /* eat_qty_fr 섭취_량_FROM numeric */ ,eat_qty_to /* eat_qty_to 섭취_량_TO character(18) */ ,nutr_stat_cd /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */ ,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_dd_nutr_eat_blck WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ AND eat_qty_fr = #{eatQtyFr} /* eat_qty_fr 섭취_량_FROM numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_nutr_eat_blck.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_dd_nutr_eat_blck ( sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,eat_qty_fr /* eat_qty_fr 섭취_량_FROM numeric */
,eat_qty_to /* eat_qty_to 섭취_량_TO character(18) */
,nutr_stat_cd /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ #{eatQtyFr} /* eat_qty_fr 섭취_량_FROM numeric */
,#{eatQtyTo} /* eat_qty_to 섭취_량_TO character(18) */
,#{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
,#{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dd_nutr_eat_blck.update */ UPDATE ti_dd_nutr_eat_blck
,eat_qty_to = #{eatQtyTo} /* eat_qty_to 섭취_량_TO character(18) */
,nutr_stat_cd = #{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
,use_yn = #{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ AND eat_qty_fr = #{eatQtyFr} /* eat_qty_fr 섭취_량_FROM numeric */
